mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_id, user_id, reward_id, amount) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{reward_id}, #{amount})
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where cart_id=#{cart_id}
mapper.select: select cart_id, r.reward_id reward_id, u.user_id user_id, u.name user_name, r.name reward_name, img, amount, price reward_price, price*amount money from suho_user u, cart c, suho_reward r where u.user_id=c.user_id and c.reward_id=r.reward_id and c.user_id=#{user_id} order by cart_id
select nvl(sum(price*amount), 0) from cart c, suho_reward r where c.reward_id=r.reward_id and user_id=#{user_id}
